description: Not all new girls are sacrificial lambs. Syd Black, the Hungarian Nightmare, came with skills and determination. A gem from the Eastern block of the old world, Syd comes to us from Budapest. Nina, a shining star here at US and undefeated, took on the Nightmare. The match was as competitive as a match gets, the outcome was determined by only 30 points, and if you're a member you know that is almost nothing. Who got fucked by the winner? Who suffered the defeat?
title: The Pirate (3-0) vs. The Nightmare (0-0)
